title: Bright & Shiny! Fresh bits from Supacaz, Outbound, Barfly, Velo, Versus & Voler
content:
Lots of shiny new things caught our eyes at Sea Otter Classic, but this roundup is full of the brightest, most colorful components, accessories, and kits from a wide range of brands. Starting with Velo Saddles, they had a few ultra-bright new colors for their lightweight Angel Glide, Ride, and Rise+ saddles. Itâ€™s a printed
